text: Ara kaphiraderake jahannamera dike dale dale hamkiye niye ya'oya habe [1]. Abasese yakhana tara jahannamera kache asabe takhana era darajagulo khule de'oya habe ebam jahannamera raksira taderake balabe, 'tomadera kache ki tomadera madhya theke rasula aseni yara tomadera kache tomadera rabera ayatasamuha tela'oyata karata ebam e dinera saksata sambandhe tomaderake satarka karata?' Tara balabe, 'abasya'i hyam.' Kintu sastira bani kaphiradera upara bastabayita hayeche
